name: speedcurve
description: Official SpeedCurve CLI and Node.js API.

scripts.preversion: npm run test && git diff-index --quiet HEAD
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run commit-docs
scripts.postversion: git push origin master --tags || echo 'Failed to push latest tag. Please do it manually with git push origin master --tags.'
scripts.test: npm run check-src && npm run lint && npm run jest
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile-src && npm run docs
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run eslint-test
scripts.docs: typedoc --name 'SpeedCurve Node.js API Reference' --readme api.md --hideGenerator --excludeExternals --exclude src/log.ts --out docs/ src/*.ts src/model/*.ts
scripts.commit-docs: git add docs/ && git commit -m 'Build docs' || echo 'No documentation changes to commit'

author: SpeedCurve <support@speedcurve.com> (https://speedcurve.com/)
